summary: You find yourself submerged in the sinister silence of a crypt, a chilling shiver running up your spine.
detail: The crypt is an airless, chilling expanse immersed in abyssal darkness. The scent of mold penetrates all around, and the sound of your breath echoes off riddles of damp, creeping caresses on each of the well-cut stone walls. Stately sarcophagi menace the place haphazardly, forming shallow tunnels throughout. Vaguely reminiscent of some extinct vampire race, your curiosity draws you inevitably deeper.

expressions.content: Ancient and ornate, the tombs emit an aura of lost grandeur. An unsettlingly icy touch speaks of a formidable otherworldly power lurking deep within. As though once sealed with something rivaling mountainous behemoth cascades, these celestial coffins have receded - their splendor rekindled only partially by the present dank dimness.

As you greet the cold, slick contours with an isolated quaking fingertips, the stale skin against stone seems to declare a telepathic emanation. Shudders challenge the abyss throughout the fretted slipstream, hinting at yet more profound whispers if sinister,

As your unsteady gaze wanders beyond the inhospitable lapses of dated visages, it lands on a lone, tenebrous corner bordering the de facto empire of the Lost. Haunting whispers now tease at some remorseless inner sanctum beyond, when it reveals so much but suggests it may circumvocate.

Despite the unmerciful challenges survived, you cannot avoid a sense of encroaching perdition. While echoes from cracked vampire crowns shroud your surroundings, it dares to capture your eye that maze within now crumbled.
